options.text:
My daily anchor
Same mug same moment, same me.

A precision test
I'm chasing god-tier crema.

A wild card
Depends who I wake up as today.

A shared ritual
Half the joy's in who I drink it with.

questions.text: When it comes to taste, you’re drawn to…

options.text:
Smooth and steady
the comfort playlist of coffee.

Bold and balanced
pure craft, zero shortcuts.

Whatever fits the mood
variety keeps things interesting.

The easy crowd-pleaser
hits the spot without overthinking it.

questions.text: When you’re at the machine, you…

options.text:
Geek out
pressure, grind, and tamp like it’s performance art.
Hit brew, zone out and trust the machine.

Treat it like a creative outlet
follow the recipe once, then make it yours.

Take everyone’s order
coffee diplomacy is your love language.

questions.text: When your cup hits the bench, it usually…

options.text:
Keeps it stripped-back
black, white, and effortlessly unfussy.

Looks engineered by NASA
precision, poise, serious intent.

Could start a micro-trend on TikTok
confident pour, main-character energy.

Feels like home
warm, familiar and a little nostalgic.

precisionist.title:
The
precisionist
precisionist.description1: You know perfection doesn't happen by accident it happens one micro-adjustment at a time. You're the type to notice when the crema's two seconds late.
precisionist.proofpoint: Weight-based dosing and active temperature control keep every variable locked, so the details stay as dialled as you are.

optimiser.title:
The
optimiser
optimiser.description1: You can’t leave well enough alone — and that’s the point. You tweak, refine, and shave seconds until routine becomes art.
optimiser.proofpoint: Barista Assist Technology™ takes out the guesswork, guiding you from grind size to extraction for perfectly consistent results.

roastician.title:
The
roastician
roastician.description1: You don’t follow recipes — you follow feeling. You trust your nose, your timing, your gut, and somehow the magic always lands in the cup.
roastician.proofpoint: Barista Assist Technology™ guides you from grind to brew, translating intuition into perfectly balanced flavour.

baristocrat.title:
The
baristocrat
baristocrat.description1: You’re all polish and preference — a little ceremony, a lot of confidence. Refinement isn’t an act; it’s how you wake up.
baristocrat.proofpoint: Barista Assist Technology™ and the built-in precision grinder help you pull café-quality shots without breaking your stride.

classicist.title:
The
classicist
classicist.description1: You trust tradition over trends — believing that quality endures and restraint is its own reward.
classicist.proofpoint: Weight-based dosing and stable temperature control let you honour the essentials without distraction.

smooth_operator.title:
The
smooth operator
smooth_operator.description1: You keep everything humming — steady tempo, effortless flow. Nothing flusters you; every pour feels like muscle memory.
smooth_operator.proofpoint: Active temperature and pressure control deliver flawless consistency, so every shot stays as smooth as your rhythm.

brewsmith.title:
The
brewsmith
brewsmith.description1: You trust your hands and your tools. For you, craft is care — process is the point, and control is comfort.
brewsmith.proofpoint: Manual dose control and precision grind settings let you fine-tune every element of your brew.

home_brewer.title:
The
home brewer
home_brewer.description1: You make coffee the heart of your home — warm, familiar, and always ready to share. Your kitchen smells like belonging.
home_brewer.proofpoint: One-touch brewing and active temperature control deliver café-quality comfort, cup after cup.

zen_brewer.title:
The
zen brewer
zen_brewer.description1: You find calm in motion — patient, present, and precise. The process is your meditation; the pour, your pause.
zen_brewer.proofpoint: Barista Assist Technology™ keeps every step steady and balanced, so you can stay fully in your flow.

mood_swinger.title:
The
mood swinger
mood_swinger.description1: No rules, just vibes. You brew by instinct - espresso at dawn, cold brew at noon, maybe an affogato for dinner. Consistency’s overrated anyway.
mood_swinger.proofpoint: 3-in-1 versatility lets you shift from bold espresso to smooth cold brew or easy drip, depending on the mood.

blendsetter.title:
The
blendsetter
blendsetter.description1: You see coffee as a canvas — remixing, experimenting, setting the tone before anyone else catches on. Innovation’s just your comfort zone.
blendsetter.proofpoint: Multiple drink presets give you the flexibility for many drink styles without manual dialing.

ritualist.title:
The
ritualist
ritualist.tagline: Same time, same place, same joy.
ritualist.description1: For you, coffee isn’t just a drink — it’s an anchor. You find calm in consistency, comfort in repetition, and strength in keeping the ritual alive.
ritualist.proofpoint: Precision extraction and consistent grind settings guarantee your ritual tastes the same, every time.

everybuddy.title:
The
everybuddy
everybuddy.description1: You make coffee a social ritual — the chat before work, the refill that becomes a catch-up, the reason to linger just a bit longer.
everybuddy.proofpoint: Quick-brew convenience and generous capacity keep the cups — and the conversations — flowing.

percolator.title:
The
percolator
percolator.description1: You’re the energy source — warm, curious, always connecting people over a pour. When you’re around, the conversation never runs dry.
percolator.proofpoint: Barista Assist Technology™ helps you juggle new recipes and shared moments with effortless consistency.

beanfluencer.title:
The
beanfluencer
beanfluencer.tagline: Social by nature, caffeinated by choice.
beanfluencer.description1: You know what’s trending before it’s poured — talkative, tuned-in, contagiously upbeat. You don’t just make coffee; you make it a movement.
beanfluencer.proofpoint: 3-in-1 versatility lets you share whatever’s next — espresso martinis, cold brew, or a classic pour.

brewmantic.title:
The
brewmantic
brewmantic.description1: You pour your heart into every cup, the way some people write love letters. A swirl of nostalgia, a dash of foam, and suddenly the morning feels cinematic.
brewmantic.proofpoint: Dual Froth System creates silky, café-quality microfoam for drinks as soft and sincere as you are.
